title: U.C.L.A. and U.S.C. Are Expected to Leave the Pac-12 for the Big Ten
description: The move by two of the Pac-12 Conference’s marquee schools came as the Big Ten closed in on a new television deal.
dc:creator: Alan Blinder and Billy Witz
media:description: The Big Ten would add the nation’s second-largest television market to its footprint after the move is completed.
